title: Bowl with Spoon
description:
A bowl with a silver spoon inside, as used to eat cereal or soup. Bowl color varies across platforms, as do contents, though most are empty.

WhatsApp's bowl contains tomato soup, while Google's previously contained breakfast cereal.
apple_vendor_description: The bowl with spoon emoji on Apple devices showcases a simple, elegant bowl filled with a light-colored substance, accompanied by a gracefully curved spoon resting within or beside it. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading give the dish a clean and appetizing appearance, suggesting a meal or sustenance. It's commonly used to represent food, eating, or nourishment in a straightforward and pleasing manner.
